thread.title_full: Fans Say Dominoâ€™s New Menu Item Is Oven-Baked Perfection

author: NewsBreak Original
title: Fans Say Dominoâ€™s New Menu Item Is Oven-Baked Perfection
text:
By Yasmine Coleman ,
2 hours ago
Domino's is continuing its foray into offering foods other than pizza, and its new menu item already has fans drooling.
On Wednesday, Sept. 18, food blogger Markie Devo took to Instagram to share news of the chain's latest addition: Mac & Cheese.
There are said to be two different flavors of the creamy dish, which the foodie described in the post's caption. "5-Cheese Mac & Cheese features penne pasta combined with a blend of cheddar, American, Parmesan-Asiago, mozzarella blend, and Alfredo sauce â€“ all oven-baked to creamy, bubbly perfection," he explained, while "Spicy Buffalo 5-Cheese Mac & Cheese adds a flavorful twist to the classic dish, as it is drizzled with hot buffalo sauce."
The big move makes sense for the brand, given that the eatery already offers a variety of oven-baked pastas prepared using the same type of noodles, including Chicken Alfredo, Italian Sausage Marinara, Chicken Carbonara, Pasta Primavera, as well as a Build Your Own option.
The foodie insider further shared that curious tastebuds eager to try out the new menu items can do so once they are made available at Dominoâ€™s locations nationwide starting on Sept. 23, 2024.
In the comment section of the upload, fans expressed excitement for Domino's twist on the cult classic meal.
"Definitely YAYYY. I just had a pasta bowl from them earlier ðŸ˜‚," one expressed, while another simply said "They sound good."
"If only these had chicken in them ðŸ¤¤ðŸ¤¤," a third wished, as another follower recalled, "they used to have mac n cheese like 10 years ago! it was really good."
Meanwhile, someone else suggested a minor tweak when ordering: "I know certain locations still do it on request but this in a bread bowl would hit so differently ðŸ¤¤."
